meanings.sent1: The presignifying clouds hinted at an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: Her presignifying smile foreshadowed the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The presignifying cat toy led to unexpected laughter.
meanings.sent4: The presignifying alarm clock warned of the impending chaos.
meanings.sent5: The presignifying smell of rain filled the air with anticipation.

meanings.definition: To signify or represent in advance
meanings.sent1: His actions presignifying his intentions to leave the company.
meanings.sent2: The ancient symbols presignifying a prosperous harvest.
meanings.sent3: She presignifying her victory with a confident wink.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph presignifying memories of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious letter presignifying a life-changing opportunity.
